s: Looked up alkaline water and checked to see what was available with great reviews. Flow was my choice and I’m loving it, and I’m now drinking one carton a day (a glass of any other water was a struggle unless it was flavoured). It has a lovely smooth texture and taste. Nice chilled or room temperature. My son who is a Fiji drinker tried it and tasted the difference between the brands ...
